title: Stacey Abrams to Run for Georgia Governor
sub_head: Democrat announces candidacy three years after losing to Brian Kemp in razor-close race
body:
Stacey Abrams said she is running for governor of Georgia for a second time.
Ms. Abrams, a former Georgia state representative, is the first Democrat to declare her candidacy in the 2022 Georgia gubernatorial election. She lost her first bid for governor to Republican Brian Kemp in 2018, by 1.4 percentage points. Mr. Kemp has said he would seek re-election.
